entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who was visited by a desire to seize something and throttle someone. He is also quoted in the conversation.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who asked a question about You-Know-Who's intentions.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who was asked by You-Know-Who to give him a job after he left. He is also thought to have believed that You-Know-Who only wanted to come back to find something.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is mentioned as the one who asked Dumbledore for a job and is thought to have only wanted to come back to find something.

relationships.description: You-Know-Who asked Dumbledore for a job after he left. This is mentioned in the conversation between Harry, Hermione, and others.
You-Know-Who wanted to throttle Harry. This is mentioned in the first sentence of the text as a desire that Harry had.
